subject: Re: Most Haunted & The Box
author: April Slaughter
full_text:
Thank you! We are very excited. Whether they catch nothing or
establish some sort of communication, I am thrilled to have lent out a
piece of our team's equipment to the Most Haunted Crew.

I will also be interviewing Dr. O'Keeffe for an upcoming article in
TAPS Paramagazine.

:-)
April
